/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
